      • draw

        public void draw​(java.util.List list,
                 java.awt.Graphics g)
        This method draws the shape on the panel it is called from, with the relevant fill and pen colours. If param list does not have the required information, returns.
        Specified by:
        draw in class Draw
        Parameters:
        list - List of tool instance, Points, pen colour and fill colour.
        g - Java Swing paint graphics.
